name: Dynamite With A Laser Beam - Alpha Version- feedback would b
description: OK, this is pretty shaky and needs to lose a few cards. It's pretty much intended to manipulate ICE and try to make it hard for the Corp to rez enough to protect their servers without that being the deck's whole gimmick (though it doesn't exactly have a stellar suite of icebreakers). It's entirely theoretical at the moment as I don't even have Mala Tempora.

name: Am I crazy for thinking this could work? Version 2 (Lots of
Newdromeda
description:
I have constructed a deck which is quite similar to the deck of Jens Erickson, who won the 2013 Netrunner World Championship recently. It was very similar to the deck I have been playing so far, but I have made some adjustments to my liking:

-1 Professional Contacts -1 John Masanori +1 Mr. Li I'm in favor of a good draw, I will get the credits from a different source. I find Professional Contacts a bit too pricey and Mr. Li does not cost any influence. I'm not very fond of John Masanori, since it is just a danger for itself and the other contacts.

-1 Corroder +1 Atman The icebreakers are quite the same, this is the only difference. I just felt I have to include an Atman, because it works together so well with Datasuckers. The -1 Corroder is a bit of a pain, but I have to get some influence from somewhere.

-1 Emergency Shutdown -1 Easy Mark -1 Inside Job +1 Stimhack +3 Daily Casts I have cut down a bit from the criminal events to make room for some credit cards. Daily Casts is such a nice card to begin with in first round.

Any ideas? Other suggestions?

name: Notoriously Ran - cutesy combo deck or a real thing?
description:
Gives you lots of chances to score notoriety. Earlybird + doppelganger could theoretically score you 3 points if you played it savvy.

All nighter is there in case you need to take kati to do it as well. The good thing is, all of the event: run cards, you can siphon HQ, dirty laundry R&D, and doppelganger to archives, and come out way ahead cash wise, and even snag an access, all in addition to scoring a notoriety.

Maybe get the win in 1 turn! 2 pointer from HQ, 2 2 pointers from R&D and a notoriety ftw!

Zu and femme, in addition to crypsis cover you if you MUST run the remote, but really get your central focused breakers out and go to town.

Just a goof combo deck that might actually work out to be a thing.

name: Andromeda: Notorious rush v1.11 (Tournament)
description: Chase The Can" (Charity Turnier), 21th Dec 2013 in Atlantis/Hamburg

name: Lana Kane - BLACK ops field agent
description:
Lots of expose to punish with black guard. Standard breaker suite to allow efficient breaking. No recursion for breakers because with this much expose, you have no excuse to lose breakers... Should get up quick, and the interfaces make runs efficient once up and running. Hostage gets your 2 primary contacts going.

Power combos in this deck include:

blackguard with satellite uplink, expose 2 ice say R&D and the remote, then forged orders the ice of HQ and if they trash it, you should be free to siphon up! After siphoning, hit the codecracker for expose/rez pain. Also you should expose suspected assets, make them pay for the adonis or sansan, then go trash it before they get anything out of it! Same for eve and painfully melange (at least you can bank job it!)

Bank job is there to help punish remotes. Should get up and going quick. With special order.

name: Yog.1 Power Up
description: Your objective with this deck is to get Yog.0 installed on Dinosaurus and maybe throw on a few "the personal touch's". Kit will turn the ice to code gate, then Yog.0 will let you break the sub routines for free. Creeper and Battering Ram will let you get through the few pieces of ice that Yog.0 cant break.

name: Whizzard Parasite Your World
description: A deck based on lower the strength of ices and kill them all with parasite. Wyrm, Bishop, datasucker, Ice Carver will help with the cause. Also we have supporting cards like: Surge and Grimore. The rest of the startegy is to play with the heap: SOT, Clone and Deja Vu. The only shield you have is Infiltration and your own brain, use it correctrly
